segments.text: I need help . I think my arm is broken .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . Have you been to this hospital before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I haven't . I need help quick . It hurts really badly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . It's good you came to the emergency room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see a doctor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . You will need to wait at least a short time.We are very busy tonight . There was a big car accident on Highway 106 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought this was the emergency room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is . But unless you are critically injured , you still need to wait.You aren't bleeding , are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Only a little . I fell off my porch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's terrible . Is it your right arm or your left arm ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My left arm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you fill out this form then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I can't . I'm left-handed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's very inconvenient for you then.You ' ll probably have a cast on your left arm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . But why do I have to fill out a form anyway ? This is the emergency room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . But even in emergency rooms there is some paperwork to be done.Have you ever been in an emergency room before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Just let me see a doctor . I'm worried about my arm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be brave , sir . It won't be long . I will fill out the form for you . What is your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Steve Schliessman . S C H L I E S S M A N .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright Steve . Your social security number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have medical insurance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . Blue Cross .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have your insurance card with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you can call it in later . You can phone us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I sit down now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First I need to get your address . Try to move your arm as little as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
